unnormalised: Okay, mhunnlle Mumbai-nt flat sodhchek boreponnachi vatt kitem mhunn konnain tor prashnn kelo. Satyanash, ittem ek dongol zaga asa, khas korun tum noveach xharant asat zalear. Hanv Mumbai-nt 5+ vorshank pasun jiyela, mhunnlle hanv bhov mottea sankxttanntlean pasun gell'la, haha.
normalised: Borem, konnem Mumbai-nt flat sodunc ulo asa. Sachin sanga, hanga jungle asasa, khas korun tumchea khatir navin asat thar. Hanv panch vorsham voir Mumbai-nt jietam, mhunnon hanv trasam utorla, ha ha.

unnormalised: Poileant poilem, tum kuxim jiyevnk sodtat tem tharava. Mumbai bhov vhodd asa. Tummchea ofisant lagim asonk zai tumkam? Doriachea lagim? Va xant subarbant? Bandra (W) ani Juhu sarkhi zaga fancy asat, punn kharchikui. Andheri (E) ani Borivali sarkhi zaga kharchik kamti asat, punn yatrayechi tras zadd zanv yeta. Tem poilim chintat! Mhojem poilem zage 201, Sai Apartment, Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri (W), 400053 hanga asle. Bhov bori yad, punn traffic...uff.
normalised: Poilem, tum kothaim jiyunk sodta, to nirnnoi ghe. Mumbai vhodd asa. Tumchea office lagim zai? Dorya lagim zai? Vo ek shant suburb-an zai? Bandra (W) ani Juhu-chea shetran bhangar asa, punn mahag asa. Andheri (E) ani Borivali-chea zagan tor mahag nhoi, punn yayat-jayat korunk tras zat. Tem poilem vichar kor! Mhajem poilem zago doon shekda ani ek, Sai Apartment, Lokhandwala Complex, Andheri (W), char lakh ani tevanpan asa. Bori yad aste, punn traffic...oof.

unnormalised: Uprant, online-nt sodank lagat. NoBroker, Magicbricks, ani 99acres sarkhea websites bori survat. Tummchea budget, thikan, ani zai titlyak (1 BHK, 2 BHK, vagere) filter karat. Tumi online-nt pollyatat tem tum soglem visarunk favona, fotu bhulavni asonk xakta. Tum sangit korun poilem zagek bhov bhov bhett di! Mhojea eka ixttan "dorye kuxint" asa mhunn sangitlo, punn tem zage doryeachi 5 km durlag asle!
normalised: Magir, online-nt sodunk suruvat kor. NoBroker, Magicbricks, ani ninety nine acres-chea website suruvat korunk bore. Tumcho budget, sthan, ani aavshyaktao (ek B-H-K, doon B-H-K, vagera) dakhovnchon filter kor. Punn online-nt dekhunchea sangalyaacher vishvas thevunk naka, photu bhrantiche zat. Tum karar korchea poilem sthanacher tum yeunchon zai! Mhojhea eka ixttak dorya-chem disa-chem apartment favo laglem, punn tem beach-an panch kilometer dur asla!

unnormalised: Tum bhett ditat tedna, soglem parkhat. Udokachi dab boreponni asa? Konnachea bhintintlean udok jharta? Imajim boreponnint samballtat? Tum xezariak uloitat zalear – tim tumkam sachi sangtat. Tiche sangatak, address boreponnin confirm karat. Hanvem eka listing-int pollem mhunnlle "Flat no. 7, B wing, XYZ Residency, Powai, 400076" punn sachi flat number 707 aslo!
normalised: Tum yetal tor, soglloch polle. Udka-chem zor borem asa? Kothain leeks asa? Building borem sambhallon asa? Tumak zat tor voshtink uloi – te sachin sangtele. Tanche lagun address-ak barobar nirdhar kor. Hanven eka listing-ak dekhli “Flat number sat, B wing, X-Y-Z Residency, Powai, char lakh ani sator pan” punn asli flat number sat shekda ani sat asla!

unnormalised: Nimannem, nirnnoi karonk toyar rav. Mumbai-nt zemindar katthin asonk xakta! Bhaddeacho va dharyacho babtin nirnnoi koronk zai mhunn bhieunakat. Ani soglem likhitint mell'llat. Ek saro bhaddeacho samdhan zaru asa. Tem tumkam zaitea dukhkantlean samballtat. Tumcheak tumchea swapnachem flat mell'llak shubhechha! Kiteak tum mhojea lagim C-10, Dreamland society, Goregaon (E), 400063 hanga sampdat ;)
normalised: Nimannek, bhet-ghat korun tayar rav. Mumbai-chea landlords kathin zat! Tum kiraiacher vo depositacher bhagin korunk bhiyenk naka. Ani soglloch likhpan ghe. Ek barobar kiraya karar zaroor asa. Magir tuje chinte salvar tale. Tujea swapna-chem flat sodunk borem naseeb! Kadachit tum mhajer lagim C-ten, Dreamland society, Goregaon (E), char lakh ani ek sat panant zattal ;)
